  * Whats new/fixed in v.10 (11-25-2007)
    # Fixed promotion bug, when you click on knight it was making a bishop

    # Fixed bug where shout text was not being adjusted to what was selected in preferences

    # Fixed bug where a piece was labeled as transparent sometimes at the end of a game.
    # Fixed sought parsing bug

    # Fixed a bug where multiple line urls were not being parsed correctly.

  * Whats new/fixed in v.93 (11-23-2007)

    # Fixed bug where preferences was not mvoed to front if it was already visible and selected.
